price: Ìwọ kò sì retí pé A óò sọ tírà al-Ƙur’ān kalẹ̀ fún ọ (tẹ́lẹ̀), àmọ́ ó jẹ́ ìkẹ́ kan láti ọ̀dọ̀ Olúwa rẹ. Nítorí náà, o ò gbọdọ̀ jẹ́ olùrànlọ́wọ́ fún àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́.
arabic: وَمَا كُنتَ تَرۡجُوٓاْ أَن يُلۡقَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۖ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ ظَهِيرٗا لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā kunta tarjū an yul'qā ilayka al-kitābu illā raḥmatan min rabbika falā takūnanna ẓahīran lil'kāfirīna
